Reference

decoupleR

decouple()

Evaluate multiple statistics with same input data

Statistics

GSVA wrapper

run_ora()

Over Representation Analysis - Fisher Exact Test

run_pscira()

PSCIRA (Permutation Single Cell Inference of Regulatory Activity)

run_scira()

SCIRA (Single Cell Inference of Regulatory Activity)

run_viper()

VIPER wrapper

Network converters

Rename columns and add defaults values if column not present

Before to run statistics

filter_regulons()
